page.title: 07MY HOUSE IN THE ALVES AREA
page.content: My house is a typical modern bungalow of these times and stands in half an acre of ground which is quite a lot for a modern bungalow. It is a wood frame construction enclosed with concrete blocks and has a tiled roof. Being quite a large bungalow it consists of four bedrooms, two bathrooms, a sitting room, a kitchen and a sun porch. It is heated by electricity which is common for houses like this. Most of the house is furnished with modern furniture and we have quite a lot of labour saving electrical appliances such as a deep freeze, a T.V, a music centre and an electric carving knife. The house was built by my dad eight years ago.
